body: Clone masters practice duplicating existing creatures in order to better understand how to create new life. A clone master has the following class features.
name: Clone Master
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Clone Master

sections.body: A clone master's bombs deal damage one die step lower than normal (regular bombs deal d4s, concussive bombs deal 1d3s, and so on). This otherwise functions as and replaces the standard alchemist bomb class feature.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Clone Master/Bomb
sections.name: Bomb

sections.body: At 7th level, a clone master adds lesser simulacrum to his formula book as a 3rd-level extract.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Clone Master/Lesser Simulacrum
sections.name: Lesser Simulacrum

sections.body: At 8th level, a clone master can prepare a clone of himself that awakens if he is slain. Creating the clone costs 5,000 gp, takes 1 week of work, and requires 3 additional weeks for the clone to grow to maturity. If he dies, the clone awakens as if the alchemist had used the clone spell on himself. He can have one inert of himself at a time. Unused clones created by a clone master do not rot. This ability replaces poison resistance +6 and poison immunity.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Clone Master/Rebirth
sections.name: Rebirth

sections.body: At 13th level, a clone master adds simulacrum to his formula book as a 5th-level extract.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Clone Master/Simulacrum
sections.name: Simulacrum

sections.body: At 16th level, a clone master adds clone to his formula book as a 6th-level extract.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Clone Master/Clone
sections.name: Clone

sections.body: The following discoveries complement the clone master archetype: alchemical simulacrum*, doppelganger simulacrum*, preserve organs*, and parasitic twin*.
sections.name: Discoveries
